swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.items

Interface Item

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LR0Item, LR1Item

    public interface Item
    Basic interface for a Production associated with a position ("dot").
    Author:
    Gero

        Symbol getNextSymbol()
        Returns:

        boolean isShiftable()
        Returns:

        Returns:
        Reverse of isShiftable()
